item.title: About
item.description: Who I am: I am a self-taught programmer with an interest in learning new technologies and solving interesting problems. What I do: I am an Engineering Technology student with a dual concentration in computer engineering and mechatronics at Southeastern Louisiana University. My hobbies: I enjoy reading fantasy and sci-fi novels, spending time with family, and learning new things. Projects Remedy A Discord bot made with Nostrum, which has support for ffmpeg and streamlink, for playing audio from various sources (e.
